context.name: message
context.description: A pre-constructed message for the alert.

context.name: title
context.description: A pre-constructed title for the alert.

context.name: group
context.description: The group that exceeded the threshold.

context.name: date
context.description: The date the alert exceeded the threshold.

context.name: value
context.description: The value that exceeded the threshold.

context.name: conditions
context.description: A string describing the threshold comparator and threshold

params.name: threshold
params.description: An array of values to use as the threshold; 'between' and 'notBetween' require two values, the others require one.

params.name: thresholdComparator
params.description: A comparison function to use to determine if the threshold as been met.

context.name: entityId
context.description: The entity ID of the document that triggered the alert

context.name: entityDateTime
context.description: The date the entity was recorded in the boundary

context.name: entityDocumentId
context.description: The id of the contained entity document

context.name: detectionDateTime
context.description: The alert interval end time this change was recorded

context.name: entityLocation
context.description: The location of the entity

context.name: containingBoundaryId
context.description: The id of the boundary containing the entity

context.name: containingBoundaryName
context.description: The boundary the entity is currently located within

context.name: message
context.description: A message for the alert.

context.name: title
context.description: A title for the alert.

context.name: date
context.description: The date that the alert met the threshold condition.

context.name: value
context.description: The value that met the threshold condition.

context.name: hits
context.description: The documents that met the threshold condition.

context.name: conditions
context.description: A string that describes the threshold condition.

params.name: index
params.description: The index the query was run against.

params.name: esQuery
params.description: The string representation of the Elasticsearch query.

params.name: size
params.description: The number of hits to retrieve for each query.

params.name: threshold
params.description: An array of values to use as the threshold; 'between' and 'notBetween' require two values, the others require one.

params.name: thresholdComparator
params.description: A function to determine if the threshold has been met.

context.name: timestamp
context.description: The bucket timestamp of the anomaly

context.name: timestampIso8601
context.description: The bucket time of the anomaly in ISO8601 format

context.name: jobIds
context.description: List of job IDs that triggered the alert instance

context.name: message
context.description: Alert info message

context.name: isInterim
context.description: Indicate if top hits contain interim results

context.name: score
context.description: Anomaly score at the time of the notification action

context.name: topRecords
context.description: Top records

context.name: topInfluencers
context.description: Top influencers

context.name: anomalyExplorerUrl
context.description: URL to open in the Anomaly Explorer

context.name: message
context.description: A generated message summarizing the currently down monitors

context.name: downMonitorsWithGeo
context.description: A generated summary that shows some or all of the monitors detected as "down" by the alert

state.name: monitorName
state.description: A human friendly rendering of name or ID, preferring name (e.g. My Monitor)

state.name: monitorId
state.description: ID of the monitor.

state.name: monitorUrl
state.description: URL of the monitor.

state.name: monitorType
state.description: Type (e.g. HTTP/TCP) of the monitor.

state.name: statusMessage
state.description: Status message e.g down or is below availability threshold in case of availability check or both.

state.name: latestErrorMessage
state.description: Monitor latest error message

state.name: observerLocation
state.description: Observer location from which heartbeat check is performed.

state.name: observerHostname
state.description: Observer hostname from which heartbeat check is performed.

state.name: firstCheckedAt
state.description: Timestamp indicating when this alert first checked

state.name: firstTriggeredAt
state.description: Timestamp indicating when the alert first triggered

state.name: currentTriggerStarted
state.description: Timestamp indicating when the current trigger state began, if alert is triggered

state.name: isTriggered
state.description: Flag indicating if the alert is currently triggering

state.name: lastCheckedAt
state.description: Timestamp indicating the alert's most recent check time

state.name: lastResolvedAt
state.description: Timestamp indicating the most recent resolution time for this alert

state.name: lastTriggeredAt
state.description: Timestamp indicating the alert's most recent trigger time

state.name: count
state.description: The number of certs detected by the alert executor

state.name: expiringCount
state.description: The number of expiring certs detected by the alert.

state.name: expiringCommonNameAndDate
state.description: The common names and expiration date/time of the detected certs

state.name: agingCount
state.description: The number of detected certs that are becoming too old.

state.name: agingCommonNameAndDate
state.description: The common names and expiration date/time of the detected certs.

context.name: group
context.description: Name of the group reporting data

context.name: alertState
context.description: Current state of the alert

context.name: reason
context.description: A description of why the alert is in this state, including which metrics have crossed which thresholds

context.name: timestamp
context.description: A timestamp of when the alert was detected.

context.name: value
context.description: The value of the metric in the specified condition. Usage: (ctx.value.condition0, ctx.value.condition1, etc...).

context.name: metric
context.description: The metric name in the specified condition. Usage: (ctx.metric.condition0, ctx.metric.condition1, etc...).

context.name: threshold
context.description: The threshold value of the metric for the specified condition. Usage: (ctx.threshold.condition0, ctx.threshold.condition1, etc...).

context.description: Name of the group reporting data

context.name: value

context.name: alertState
context.description: Current state of the alert

context.name: metric
context.description: The metric name in the specified condition.

context.name: timestamp
context.description: A timestamp of when the anomaly was detected.

context.name: anomalyScore
context.description: The exact severity score of the detected anomaly.

context.name: actual
context.description: The actual value of the monitored metric at the time of the anomaly.

context.name: typical
context.description: The typical value of the monitored metric at the time of the anomaly.

context.name: summary
context.description: A description of the anomaly, e.g. "2x higher."

context.name: influencers
context.description: A list of node names that influenced the anomaly.

context.name: timestamp
context.description: UTC timestamp of when the alert was triggered

context.name: matchingDocuments
context.description: The number of log entries that matched the conditions provided

context.name: conditions
context.description: The conditions that log entries needed to fulfill

context.name: group
context.description: The name of the group responsible for triggering the alert

context.name: isRatio
context.description: Denotes whether this alert was configured with a ratio

context.name: ratio
context.description: The ratio value of the two sets of criteria

context.name: numeratorConditions
context.description: The conditions that the numerator of the ratio needed to fulfill

context.name: denominatorConditions
context.description: The conditions that the denominator of the ratio needed to fulfill

context.name: clusterHealth
context.description: The health of the cluster.
